decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (13707-100 and 13707-103 received on 27/05/2016 and 13707-104 Rev A received on 06/06/2016 and 13707-102 Rev B and Delivery and Servicing Plan Revision A received on 29/07/2016 and 13707-105 received on 03/08/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The operation of the site must be undertaken in line with the approved delivery and servicing plan. The turning areas shown in drawing number 13707-105 in the service yard must be kept clear of obstructions at all times for the lifetime of the development. No parking should take place within the service yard except within the marked bays shown on drawing number 13707-105 for delivery and collection for the lifetime of the development.
description: Installation of a canopy above loading bay and two external trolley shelters.
